desc: Award winning retractable & refillable lint rollers. Wall hooks and picture hangers that are beautiful, can hold 15lbs and come with patented easy set up technology that includes built-in bubble levels! Get your lint rollers hooks and hangers today and enjoy fast free shipping.

layout.text:
MADE BY FLINT
THE AWARD-WINNING LINT ROLLER
The retractable lint roller you can take wherever you go.
